title: Coaches
creator_credit: Paul Cowan, Tom Daly and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Coaches is about four people preparing their teams for the Pre-Olympics. Their distinctive approaches emerge during the fights, the good times, and those critical post-game sessions when feelings are raw or jubilant. It is a film about human growth.
